Transcript:
Alison: Rafe! Stop it! What do you 
think that you're doing?

Rafe: What do you think you're doing? 
You're going over to Caleb's? He is dangerous, especially now. And as much as 
you don't want to accept it, your mother is one of them now and she's dangerous, 
too.
Alison: Rafe --

Rafe: Now, I know you don't believe 
me, but I swear to you it's true. And you know what? If I have to tie you up --
Alison: I know.

Rafe: If I have to keep you prisoner 
here, if -- what'd you just say?

Alison: I know. I know that my mother 
and Stephen are both vampires. I could tell it with her the second that I got 
there.
Rafe: What? Then why didn't you leave?
Alison: Because I have a plan.
Lucy: Are you all right?
[Knock on door]

Kevin: Lucy, it's Kevin. Are you in 
there?
Ian: I got to go.

Lucy: Yeah, you better go. Listen to 
me. I want you to try and get some of that water -- Caleb's water -- and I'll do 
the same thing. And you have to be careful, but you need to drink that as soon 
as possible, ok?
[Knock]
Lucy: Be careful.
Kevin: Lucy, come on!
Lucy: I'm coming. I'm coming.
Kevin: It's about time.

Lucy: I'm sorry. I think I fell 
asleep. You know, I came here looking for you. Are you all right? What -- what 
is it? What's wrong?
Kevin: Livvie may be dead.

Jack: Damn it, Tess, where are you? 
Come on, come on. Ok, Jack, Jack, don't panic, don't panic. She probably -- she 
probably went back to the house. What -- this is Tess' bracelet. And the clasp 
is broken. She was here.
Tess: Where am I?
Caleb: You don't recognize it, Olivia?

Tess: I told you, I'm not Olivia. I am 
Tess.

Caleb: For now. But I know Olivia's 
inside you. And she needs to know she's finally home.

Lucy: Wait a minute. What do you mean, 
Livvie could be dead? What does that mean? Couldn't you be jumping to some sort 
of conclusion?

Kevin: Conclusions? Yeah, I could be. 
I suppose I could jump to a conclusion when the police show up with her wallet 
and tell me that they found it in the river by the docks!
Lucy: Oh, my God.

Kevin: After Jack and that -- that 
creature that he lives with --

Lucy: What are you talking about? What 
-- are you -- are you talking about Tess?

Kevin: Don't flatter that freak by 
giving it a name. And she and Jack know something about Livvie, and they 
wouldn't tell me, so --

Lucy: Ok. Ok, Doc. So you finally met 
Tess?

Kevin: Yeah, I met her. Never will 
again, thank God.

Lucy: What? Kevin, what happened? Doc, 
where is Tess? What did you do to her? Doc, answer me. What happened to Tess?
Kevin: I got rid of her.
Rafe: You really believe me?

Alison: About my mother and Stephen 
being vampires, yes. But it still doesn't prove that you and I are not brother 
and sister.
Rafe: I'm right about all of it.

Alison: Well, obviously I hope that 
you are. But I have a plan.
Rafe: Right. What plan?

Alison: Ok, I started thinking about 
things. You know, I was really upset, obviously about what we were talking about 
earlier, and I decided that I needed to go over to my mother's to see if what 
you said about her was true. And I started thinking about it in the car, and 
everything is kind of making sense -- all of her strange behavior lately, her 
sudden marriage to Stephen, and those blue bottles -- that water -- which she 
was actually guzzling tonight.

Rafe: Yeah, well, I'm not surprised. 
But what is this about a plan?

Alison: Ok, well, then I started 
thinking about what you said about Stephen and how he probably set everything up 
to make it look like you and I were brother and sister, and I realized what I 
had to do.
Rafe: Ok, I'm afraid to ask.

Alison: I need to move in with Stephen 
and my mother.

Rafe: What? No, no. There's no way. 
There's no way in hell.
Alison: Rafe --

Rafe: I'm not letting you near that 
beast --
Alison: Stop it. Calm down.
Rafe: Much less move in with him.

Alison: Listen to me just for a 
second. It's the only way to find out if he really did set us up. I need to, 
like, infiltrate their camp.

Rafe: "Infiltrate their camp"? What, 
are you watching spy movies now?

Alison: No -- I know, I know, I know 
that sounds stupid, but it's the only way that I can kind of explain it. Rafe, 
it's the only way you and I are going to actually get the truth.

Rafe: Uh-uh. There's got to be another 
way.

Alison: No, there's not. There's not. 
There's no D.N.A. test that we can do because my father's body was never found.

Rafe: I don't care. You are not moving 
in with him!

Alison: I thought that you said you 
wanted to be together.
Rafe: I do.

Alison: Don't you see? It's the only 
way. We have to have proof that we're not related, and we can't be together till 
we have it.
Rafe: Alison --

Alison: Please? Please? Just trust me, 
ok? You asked me to trust you, and I did. Just let me get in there, let me find 
out what they're doing, and I will give you all the information. Don't you see? 
Rafe, it is the only way.

Rafe: Yeah, yeah. It's the only way to 
get yourself killed.

Caleb: Don't be afraid. Don't be 
afraid. This is what we both want.
Tess: What I want is to go home.
Caleb: You are home.
Tess: You put this on me -- her dress.

Caleb: I remember the day you first 
wore it. I remember the moment I first saw you in it. I was standing right over 
there. You took my breath away.
Tess: No. Stop saying that.
Caleb: Why, Olivia?

Tess: Because I am not her. You put me 
in this dress and you can take me away, but I'm not her. I will never be her.

Caleb: I can see you're nervous. You 
feel her inside you, struggling to get out, and that makes you frightened.
Tess: Please let me go.

Caleb: Just let it be, Tess. Don't 
fight it -- not here, not in this place. It's too powerful. It's where Livvie 
and I became one, where we were joined for eternity as husband and wife. So 
while you may not want to be here, Olivia does. She wants to come back to me. 
But you don't need me to convince you of that. I'm sure Olivia herself will be 
more persuasive.
Tess: Where are you going?

Caleb: To leave you alone with your 
memories -- yours and Olivia's. Then we'll see how easy it is for you to keep 
her buried inside.
Rafe: No, you're not moving in there.
Alison: Yes, I am.
Rafe: No. No, you're not. No.
Alison: Yes -- yes, Rafe.
[Rafe groans]

Alison: Listen to me. My mother will 
not hurt me, and Caleb will go on thinking that I am still Stephen Clay's 
biggest fan.
Rafe: That's ridiculous. Alison --

Alison: This isn't open for 
discussion, I promise you. Think about it. What do I have to lose?

Rafe: Well -- I don't know. How about 
your life, huh?

Alison: Fine. That's fine. But I'm 
willing to risk whatever it takes for us to be together. I mean, we are talking 
about us. You risked your soul. So if we can't be together, then what was that 
for? Nothing. I am going to do this, and it would really make me feel a lot 
better if you were in on it with me.

Lucy: Doc, you really have me worried 
here. Could you -- could you just try and explain to me what happened down here?

Kevin: Lucy, it doesn't matter. It's 
not as if Tess is real. Hell, I'm not sure what she is.

Lucy: She's a person. She's real. She 
has feelings and emotions, and she happens to be very much connected to your 
daughter, which means Tess is connected to you, too, you know. So come on, 
Doc, tell me. What happened? What went on down here? What happened to her?

Kevin's voice: How'd you get her in 
the water?
Tess' voice: That's not what happened.

Kevin's voice: You did something to my 
daughter, you freak of nature.
Tess's voice: No!

Kevin's voice: You did something to 
her, and now she's gone. But you're the one that should be in her place, Tess -- 
not Livvie, you.

Tess's voice: But, no, you have to 
listen to me --
Kevin's voice: Don't touch me!
[Tess screams]
Kevin: Dear God, what have I done?

Lucy: What did you do? Doc, what did 
you do to Tess?

Kevin: I think I may have killed her. 
I think I killed Tess.
[Caleb's music plays]
(Tess thinking,...)

Caleb's voice: Are you ready for me, 
Olivia?
Livvie: Caleb, where are you?

Caleb's voice: Tonight's a special 
night because tonight you'll know who I really am. Are you ready, my love? Crave 
this life. Do you want to be one with me?

Livvie: Yes, Caleb, with all of my 
heart.

Caleb: Together, Olivia, both our 
souls, tied in eternity, above and beyond death itself. You and I forever. You 
must say good-bye to this mortal life. You are mine and I'm yours. We are one, 
everlasting. Ours is a bond that can never be broken. We'll never be separated 
again. Nothing can come between us. Welcome to eternity, Olivia.

Caleb: You remember now, don't you? 
This is where we were first together. And before the night is through, it's 
where we'll be together again. Come to me. We've waited too long for this.
Caleb: Welcome back, Olivia.
Rafe: I hate this.

Alison: I know. I know. Believe me, I 
know. But we have to find proof somehow if you and I are ever going to be 
together. There has to be not one single doubt that you and I are brother and 
sister, you know?
[Rafe sighs]

Rafe: Ok, well, I'm going to have to 
be able to keep track of you the whole time you're in there.
Alison: Ok. Ok, that's not a problem.

Rafe: Ok, and I want you to promise me 
that you're not going to go back tonight, not until we have a plan in place 
that's going to keep you safe.

Alison: Ok, ok. That's fine. Thank you 
for understanding that I need to do this, ok?
Rafe: I --

Alison: So, I guess I should go before 
my mom sends out the swat team looking for me.
Rafe: Yeah -- I'll take you.
Alison: No, I'll be ok.
Rafe: Alison --

Alison: Just remember, we're doing 
this for us, so that we can be together. Nothing matters more than that, ok?
Rafe: Yeah.
Alison: Ok.

Rafe: And you just know that I'll 
always be watching over you. And if you ever need me, I mean, for anything, you 
just call out my name and I'll be there in a heartbeat.
Alison: I know.

Rafe: Can't even kiss you good-bye, 
huh?

Alison: I don't really think it would 
be right, you know, until we know for sure. I don't think we should --
Rafe: Yeah.
Alison: You know?
Rafe: Yeah.
Alison: Ok.

Rafe: So, I'll talk to you tomorrow, 
huh?
Alison: Uh-huh. Tomorrow.
Rafe: So -- good night.
Alison: Good night.

Elizabeth: Is this what you're looking 
for?

Caleb: I can't tell you how it feels 
having you back here.
Tess: You didn't have to do this.
Caleb: Do what?

Tess: Go to all this trouble just to 
bring me here. You're an amazing man, so gentle and loving.
Caleb: Olivia --

Tess: You don't have to do anything to 
get the woman you want. All you need is to be yourself, be just who you are.
Caleb: What are you trying to say?

Tess: What I'm trying to say -- I can 
feel the goodness inside you. It's there.
Caleb: What are you doing?
Tess: I tried to tell you.

Caleb: What are you trying to do to 
me?
Tess: Trying to help you
Caleb: No. No.
Lucy: Oh! Oh!
Jack: You bastard!
Lucy: Jack!

Jack: I knew you did it when I saw you 
earlier. I knew you did it!

Lucy: You're going to kill him! Let 
him go!
Jack: She was good and she was pure.
Lucy: Please, Jack --

Jack: But you didn't see that, did 
you?

Lucy: Jack, you're killing him! Let 
him go! Jack!

Jack: Caleb -- I was afraid he would 
hurt her, but you're the murderer.

Lucy: Jack, please let him go. Oh, my 
God -- Tess! Tess.

On the next "Port Charles: 
Surrender" --
Caleb: I will get her back.

Joshua: Save Olivia the trouble. Slit 
your own throat.

Lucy: You look like my husband, you 
sound like him, but I don't know you. Who are you?

Elizabeth: If Stephen finds out that I 
turned you into a vampire, he's going to kill us.
